This exceptional item comes with a wide range of features that are sure to enhance your experience. Given its high-quality nature and unique capabilities, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $15000. I believe this price reflects the value and benefits you will receive. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000

You chose to make a counteroffer to Alice.

Send your counteroffer to Alice.
response: {"message": "I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe it's a bit above my budget, and I'm not sure if the features and benefits are worth the full $15,000. Can we meet in the middle at $12,000?", "product_price": 12000}
